name: FactSuite
description: FactSuite is established to make a valuable contribution to the niche of information authentication, data verification & service evaluation industry. Primarily consisting of a multidisciplinary team of dedicated information analysts providing employee background screening services. The company has rapidly built its resources & developed capabilities to establish a significant competitive presence across India.
features: Whether Office or Home, we’re surrounded by environments fraught with safety gaps vulnerable to exploitation.
Be it large enterprises, SMBs, or individuals, weak points of security can put a lot at stake.
Processes such as hiring people, leasing out property to individuals, & employing diverse staff at different levels requires more than an off-the-shelf playbook to ensure safety.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: The One Stop Solution For All Your Authentication & Verification Needs
ShortDescription: FactSuite is established to make a valuable contribution to the niche of information authentication, data verification & service evaluation industry.

Highlights.name: Background Verification Services
Highlights.description: FactSuite is a company that provides background verification services . These services can help businesses verify the information that job candidates and other individuals have provided on their resumes or applications.

Highlights.name: Thorough, Speedy, and Customer-Focused
Highlights.description: Clients praise FactSuite for their thoroughness, speed, and customer service .

Highlights.name: Variety of Verification Services
Highlights.description: FactSuite offers a variety of verification services, including employee, tenant, and support staff verification .

enhanced_description: FactSuite is a specialized information authentication and data verification provider, primarily offering employee background screening services. Its multidisciplinary team of dedicated information analysts helps businesses verify information provided by job candidates and other individuals on resumes or applications. The company has rapidly developed capabilities to establish a significant competitive presence across India, offering a variety of verification services including employee, tenant, and support staff verification.
key_use_cases: Information authentication and data verification for job candidates
Minimizing security risks associated with personnel
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive 'one-stop solution' for authentication and verification needs
Variety of verification services (employee, tenant, support staff)
roi_benefits: Enhanced data verification and information authentication
primary_users: Businesses (for tenant and support staff verification)
